name: Solitaire for Christmas
description:
Fun for the holidays!
Play solitaire with THAT CHRISTMAS FEELING!
Stylish and clear graphics will provide hours and hours of pure entertaniment!
Features includes:
- Universal App
- Easy drag and drop;
- Double tap automove;
- Auto fill card to foundation piles;
- Portrait and landscape mode;
- Easy to read card sets;
- Three Levels:
-- Easy (draw 1 and unlimited undo)
-- Medium (draw 3 and unlimited undo)
-- Hard (draw 3 and no undo)
- Gamecenter leaderboards:
-- Games played
-- Games won for each level;
-- Cumulative time played and games won
